Today in Gower, surf is on at 6 ft @ 8s WSW with a fresh 16 mph SW wind. Broughton Bay and Llangennith Beach are your best bets, offering clean conditions during the tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop to poor with 6 ft @ 11s WSW and a stronger 22 mph SSW wind, making it a day to skip. Day after, surf improves to 6 ft @ 9s WSW with a lighter 12 mph W wind, making for a fun session at spots like Broughton Bay and Llangennith Beach. Best: day after.
